mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_perfume (p_price, p_size, p_brand, p_nm, p_pic) VALUES (#{p_price}, #{p_size}, #{p_brand}, #{p_nm}, #{p_pic})
mapper.select: SELECT p_brand, b_nm_eng, b_nm_kor FROM c_code_brand

SELECT A.i_p, B.p_nm, B.p_price, B.p_pic, B.p_size, C.b_nm_eng, COUNT(A.i_p) AS favorite_cnt FROM t_user_favorite_perfume A INNER JOIN t_perfume B ON A.i_p = B.i_p INNER JOIN c_code_brand C ON B.p_brand = C.p_brand INNER JOIN t_note D ON B.i_p = D.i_p INNER JOIN c_nt_d E ON D.nt_d_c = E.nt_d_c INNER JOIN c_nt_m F ON E.nt_m_c = F.nt_m_c WHERE F.nt_m_c = #{nt_m_c} GROUP BY A.i_p ORDER BY favorite_cnt DESC LIMIT 0, #{sliders_per_view}

SELECT A.i_p, B.p_nm, B.p_price, B.p_pic, B.p_size, C.b_nm_eng FROM t_user_favorite_perfume A INNER JOIN t_perfume B ON A.i_p = B.i_p INNER JOIN c_code_brand C ON B.p_brand = C.p_brand GROUP BY i_p LIMIT 0,5

select.if: SELECT A.i_p, A.p_nm, A.p_price, B.b_nm_eng, A.p_size, A.p_pic, C.i_user FROM t_perfume A LEFT JOIN c_code_brand B ON A.p_brand = B.p_brand LEFT JOIN t_user_favorite_perfume C ON A.i_p = C.i_p AND C.i_user = #{i_user}

mapper.select: SELECT A.i_p, B.nt_d_nm, B.nt_d_nm_kor FROM t_note A INNER JOIN c_nt_d B ON A.nt_d_c = B.nt_d_c WHERE A.i_p = #{i_p}
SELECT MAX(i_p) as i_p FROM t_perfume

SELECT A.i_p, A.p_nm, A.p_price, b_nm_eng, A.p_size, A.p_pic, C.i_user FROM t_perfume A LEFT JOIN c_code_brand B ON A.p_brand = B.p_brand LEFT JOIN t_user_favorite_perfume C ON A.i_p = C.i_p AND C.i_user = #{i_user} WHERE A.i_p = #{i_p}
SELECT b_nm_eng FROM c_code_brand WHERE b_nm_eng like '${b_nm_initial}%'
select A.i_p, A.p_nm, A.p_brand, A.p_price, B.b_nm_eng, A.p_size, A.p_pic from t_perfume A inner join c_code_brand B on A.p_brand = B.p_brand where B.b_nm_eng like '${b_nm_eng}'

SELECT A.i_p, A.p_brand, A.p_nm, A.p_price, B.b_nm_eng, A.p_size, A.p_pic FROM t_perfume A INNER JOIN c_code_brand B ON A.p_brand = B.p_brand
WHERE B.b_nm_eng LIKE '${b_nm_initial}%'
WHERE B.b_nm_eng NOT IN ('ETC') AND B.b_nm_eng LIKE '${b_nm_initial}%'

SELECT A.i_p, A.p_brand, A.p_nm, A.p_price, B.b_nm_eng, A.p_size, A.p_pic FROM t_perfume A INNER JOIN c_code_brand B ON A.p_brand = B.p_brand
WHERE B.b_nm_eng = 'ETC'
WHERE B.b_nm_eng NOT IN ('ETC') AND B.b_nm_eng LIKE '${b_nm_initial}%'
GROUP BY B.b_nm_eng
SELECT i_p, p_pic FROM t_perfume WHERE i_p = #{i_p}
